message.body: What are your thoughts on flagging videos for the singing of Happy Birthday?
I thought we got the ok that that song was fine
Yeah, someone named Nadine saId she thought we were allowed, but I was still unsure because I know that it has strict licensing in film so I wanted a second opinion. I'm letting it through.
I have been letting it go too
Is inside a car or bus considered indoors or outdoors?
I've been going with indoors for inside vehicles.
What if its a convertible or has the windows open?
Hm, probably outdoors in that case. I did outdoors also when people were ordering food from a drive thru.
